attributes.action: Recognise Somaliland as a sovereign state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Somaliland's population have succeeded in creating a working democracy in the north of the Somalia. Yet their attempts at gaining internatonal recognition have fallen on deaf ears.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Recognise Somaliland as a sovereign state."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11305.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Somaliland/
